artist: Artist: Tsukioka Yoshitoshi; Publisher: Nakaya Tokusaburō
creditline: The Mary Griggs Burke Endowment Fund established by the Mary Livingston Griggs and Mary Griggs Burke Foundation, gifts of various donors, by exchange, and gift of Edmond Freis in memory of his parents, Rose and Leon Freis
description: charcoal gray-green cover; illustrated pages in peach, blue, and black; many images contain men fighting large or mythical creatures; other smaller images of people with animals, flowers, toys, ephemera
medium: Woodblock printed book; ink and color on paper
portfolio: From Sketches by Ikkai (Ikkai manga 一魁漫画)
title: Sketches by Ikkai, vol. 1
